remarks: Intersection of two open intervals of extended reals.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
statement: iooin $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* ) /\ ( C e. RR* /\ D e. RR* ) ) -> ( ( A (,) B ) i^i ( C (,) D ) ) = ( if ( A <_ C , C , A ) (,) if ( B <_ D , B , D ) ) ) $.
